acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This item came to the Library of Virginia in shipments of court papers from the City of Winchester.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Dr. William S. Love was born in Ireland in 1838 and was a physician in the Winchester (Va.) area.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Dr. William S. Love Ledger, 1888-1899, records the accounts of individual patients. Each entry listed under patient name includes date and amount of money owed and paid. Often other family members treated are listed by name under the account of the head of household. Some accounts include the home address or the property name for the patient. There are no details provided for either the type of treatment administered or for the reason prompting the doctor's visit.
